name: Florges
author: Satoshi Shirai
flavor_text: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.

abilities.name: Wondrous Gift
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, put an Item card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Mist Guard
attacks.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from {N} Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn.
